actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski under the authority of the order of May 13, 81. With written report No. 97-118.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 146.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original bill to extend authorization for appropriations for the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Disaster Relief Act Amendments of 1981 - Amends the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for disaster relief for fiscal year 1982.

titles.title: An original bill to extend authorization for appropriations for the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
